com.facebook.buck.apple.simulator

Class AppleDeviceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.apple.simulator.AppleDeviceController

  • public class AppleDeviceController
extends Object
    Utility class to control Apple Devices (both simulators and physical devices). Examples include booting them, installing and launching bundles inside of the devices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AppleDeviceController.AppleDeviceKindEnum
      Enum indicating the different kinds of devices possible
      static class  AppleDeviceController.LaunchBehavior
      Enum for the different ways to launch the simulator

      • getSimulatorUdidForTest

        public Optional<String> getSimulatorUdidForTest()
        Picks the simulator to be used for testing
        Returns:
        the udid of any booted simulator (iphone) and if there are none returns any simulator. If there are none, returns optional empty

      • bootSimulator

        public boolean bootSimulator(String simulatorUdid)
                      throws IOException,
                             InterruptedException
        Starts up the iOS simulator using idb, which waits until the simulator is completely booted.

        Call isSimulatorAvailable(String) before invoking this method to ensure the simulator is available.

        Returns:
        true if idb was able to boot the simulator, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • isSimulatorAvailable

        public boolean isSimulatorAvailable(String simulatorUdid)
        Parameters:
        simulatorUdid - of the simulator is available
        Returns:
        true if the simulator is available, false otherwise

      • installBundle

        public Optional<String> installBundle(String deviceUdid,
                                      Path bundlePath)
                               throws IOException,
                                      InterruptedException
        Installs a bundle in a previously-started simulator or physical device.
        Returns:
        true if the bundle was installed, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

        public boolean bringSimulatorToFront(String simulatorUdid)

                                     InterruptedException
        Brings the desired simulator to the front
        Returns:
        true if it managed to do so, false otherwise
